name: Keppra vs. levetiracetam
title: Prescribing of branded Keppra tablets (BNF code 0408010A0BB)
compared with prescribing of all levetiracetam tablets (BNF code 0408010A0)
description: as a proportion of total quantity of levetiracetam tablets
why_it_matters: This is one of the NHS Business Service Authority's top cost-savers from
generic switching. Keppra is an expensive branded form of the chemical
levetiracetam. The MHRA's guidance is that it is usually unnecessary
to maintain patients on a specific manufacturer's levetiracetam product
unless there are specific concerns such as patient anxiety, or risk of
numerator_where: (bnf_code LIKE '0408010A0BB%AC' OR bnf_code LIKE '0408010A0BB%AA' OR bnf_code LIKE '0408010A0BB%AB'
denominator_where: (bnf_code LIKE '0408010A0%AC' OR bnf_code LIKE '0408010A0%AA' OR bnf_code LIKE '0408010A0%AB'
